filterChain.name: ReadCurriculumHistoricAuthorization
filterChain.expression: ManagerAuthorization || TeacherAuthorization || AcademicAdministrativeOfficeAuthorization || TimeTableManagerAuthorization || GEPAuthorization || (DepartmentCreditsManagerAuthorization && DepartmentAdministrativeOfficeAuthorization && EmployeeAuthorization)

filterChain.name: EmployeeBelongsToTeacherDepartment
filterChain.description: Verifies whether a given employee belongs to the same department the teacher does

filterChain.name: ReadStudentCurricularPlansAccess
filterChain.expression: StudentCurricularPlanOwnerAuthorization || StudentTutorAuthorization || StudentDegreeCoordinatorAuthorization || DegreeAdministrativeOfficeAuthorization || DegreeAdministrativeOfficeSuperUserAuthorization || CoordinatorAuthorization || FinalDegreeWorkOrientatorForCandidacy || AlumniAuthorization || DepartmentAdministrativeOfficeAuthorization
